meanings.definition: The study of the distribution, movement, and quality of water on Earth.
meanings.sent1: Hydrologies help us understand how water moves on our planet.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use hydrologies to learn about water distribution on Earth.
meanings.sent3: Learning hydrologies can be like solving a puzzle about water.
meanings.sent4: The complexity of hydrologies is like untangling a web of water pathways.
meanings.sent5: Studying hydrologies makes the invisible flow of water visible.

meanings.definition: The scientific study of the properties, distribution, and effects of water on the earth's surface, in the soil and underlying rocks, and in the atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: Understanding hydrologies helps us protect our environment.
meanings.sent2: Hydrologies provide insights into how water impacts different parts of the Earth.
meanings.sent3: Exploring hydrologies can be like discovering hidden secrets of water.
meanings.sent4: The depth of hydrologies is like diving into the mysteries of water systems.
meanings.sent5: Delving into hydrologies reveals the interconnectedness of water in nature.
